title: Pen Test Partners
extract: Pen Test Partners LLP is a limited liability partnership for one very good reason; being in a partnership means that our people have a vested interest in the company. It's that employee ownership which inspires and drives quality in what we do. It means that we can meet and exceed the needs of our clients.
extract_html: Pen Test Partners LLP is a limited liability partnership for one very good reason; being in a partnership means that our people have a vested interest in the company. It's that employee ownership which inspires and drives quality in what we do. It means that we can meet and exceed the needs of our clients.
